mutants.code:
def minimum_coins_to_exceed_half_sum(n, coins):
    sorted_coins = sorted(coins, reverse=True)
    half_sum = sum(sorted_coins) / 2
    current_sum = 0
    count = 0
    for coin in sorted_coins:
        current_sum += coin
        count += 1
        if current_sum > half_sum:
            break
    return count
